manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep Track of Your Loved Ones Keep an eye on the safety of your most precious assets - your family. The 54 s the most convenient and trusted device for protecting your family members old and young. With LandAirSea, Theft Is Temporary Your vehicle is one of your highest value assets. Keep a 54 discreetly attached, and enjoy the peace of mind that comes knowing you can track your car and retrieve it in the event of theft. Personal Asset Tracking Don't let your big-boy toys out of your site, even if you are around the corner or half a world away. The 54 with our SilverCloud App will keep vigilant watch over your personal assets. Made in the USA* From our manufacturing to our customer support, we are all in the USA and all of your data is stored on US servers. *from domestic and imported parts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Accurate and Effective
reviews.reviewText: This product is extremely accurate and effective. It was easy to setup, had various pricing plans, well made. and most importantly extremely accurate.I own several high-end Garmin GPS devices and the LandAirSea 54 rivals the Garmin precision.I bought this device to track my luggage on an upcoming international flight. I tested it with my car and am well pleased.The 4G connectivity picked up the device location from the first level of a 5 story parking garage at my workplace. Furthermore, it transmitted the location to 8 floors up in my office building.Normally GPS is not reliable in this scenario but the device succeeded.I don't trust my Samsung Smart Tag with only Bluetooth to show me where my luggage is. I do think I will get a good result on the future trip.The app is also simple yet well designed.5 Stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Need to Rely on Cellular Network
reviews.reviewText: Great tracker! I use it for my checked luggage overseas.Pricing: Multiple pricing tiers. I chose the most basic for updates every 3 mins.Accuracy: Pretty good. Seems accurate within 40ft (12m) or less. RED icon in photos is the devices reported location. BLUE is actual location.Battery: last a couple days on the 180sec/3min update plan. It will drain much faster if you choose more frequent updates.Size: fits easily in a small zipper pouch inside my luggage where my laundry bag is stored.After 1 disastrous trip where I was told to come pick up my bag 5 different times only to drive 45 mins, show up and it not be there. 2 airlines lost the same bag that trip. I could have saved myself so much time and money if I had this at the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: This is my fourth land and seatracker. I had two for 2 years, and they worked like a charm. They finally stopped working.I purchased a different land and Sea tracker a few months ago and it didn’t work, I now believe it was because of the location in the vehicle. in the past couple ofweeks I have tried two different companies trackers. The first was so complicated and I never could get it to actually work with a map and tracker location. I positioned it in different areas of vehicle and still no results. The company did offer help but I thought this is too complicated and more for a fleetoperation. Second companies platform wanted you to sign up and only identified one fee for service. with no explanation of how many seconds of update for that fee. Attempted to contact for information and continuously dumped into online chat. It was clearly not person, but computer, because it could not answer that simple question. I want to say that Sea Land Air have a very simple sign up platform you know exactly whatupdate times you’re paying for. simple instructions for how to operate and i could see immediately the map and my vehicle. I love this group and have talked directly to their representatives multiple times in the past. now I’m hoping that it works as well as it did. I will let you know. i’m giving the device four stars for now because I realize it’s premature but I’m so happy that it functions so easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and very accurate!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tracker to keep an eye on my luggage. So far I have been very satisfied. It was easy to setup and it has been very accurate. The charge last many days. I will update after my trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good system, but pay heed to subscription costs
reviews.reviewText: I like the product very much. Seems very well-built, and in terms of tracking, highly accurate and reports reliably (even indoors). Have yet to test long-term since I just activated the device today.The main concern was a gotcha - that the subscription costs, I've just realized, were _PER DEVICE_ , which was not my initial understanding. (Where descriptions may say "unlimited use" isn't equal to "unlimited number of devices".)This was quite the gotcha, as I purchased six of these devices. Even with a 2-year discount, the cost was still significant!Concessions were made once I had spoken with Billing. I'm not paying over $500 per device anymore, but the total bill is still nowhere close to the amount I originally thought I'd be paying.So, in summary - I've no doubt this device and system will be great to track my valuables. And, I will expect that, considering the premium I'm paying for the service.Huge silver lining though --- US company. As a YouTube reviewer said - accountability in this time and age is worth the serious consideration. That, alone is worth that premium. And, with the friendly concessions, and the company standing by their product and service - I feel it's a win-win for everyone!

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked right out of The box. Tracking seems accurate. App is simple to use
reviews.reviewText: Worked right out of The box. Tracking seems accurate. App is simple to use

This is not the cheapest tracker, but in my experience those break down easy and then you don't know whether it's the signal, a battery, or hardware is dead. This device is well made and performed as expected.

Received product in good condition and delivery was very fast though shipping from overseas. Simply registration process and easy setup, then it is ready to use. Highly recommended for serious GPS enthusiasts.

Bought this as vehicle theft tracker, works as described so far, no hassle and good tracking! Only small gripe is that I would like to see a mode where it’s in energy saving but wakes up when movement is detected and also when it leaves an instafence/geofence area
